statements: SELECT * FROM community_demographics WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT community_name, population FROM community_demographics WHERE average_age > 30;
SELECT community_name, country FROM community_demographics ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT * FROM community_demographics WHERE pollution_level = 'Low';
SELECT community_id, community_name, country FROM community_demographics WHERE population > 50000 ORDER BY average_age ASC;
SELECT community_name, population, average_age FROM community_demographics WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM community_demographics WHERE population > 100000 AND average_age < 40 ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT community_name, country FROM community_demographics WHERE population BETWEEN 50000 AND 150000 ORDER BY country, population ASC;
SELECT community_name, average_age, pollution_level FROM community_demographics WHERE pollution_level = 'High' ORDER BY average_age ASC;
SELECT community_name, country, average_age FROM community_demographics WHERE average_age > 50 ORDER BY country ASC, average_age DESC;
SELECT * FROM community_demographics;
SELECT community_name, population_size FROM community_demographics WHERE pollution_level > 0.5;
SELECT community_name, population_size FROM community_demographics ORDER BY population_size DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_theme FROM awareness_campaigns WHERE target_community_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM awareness_campaigns ORDER BY campaign_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM community_demographics ORDER BY population_size DESC;
SELECT community_name, pollution_level FROM community_demographics WHERE population_size > 10000;
SELECT community_name, population_size, pollution_level FROM community_demographics WHERE population_size BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000;
SELECT c.community_name, a.campaign_name, a.campaign_theme FROM community_demographics c JOIN awareness_campaigns a ON c.community_id = a.target_community_id;
SELECT MAX(population_size) AS max_population, MIN(pollution_level) AS min_pollution_level FROM community_demographics;
SELECT * FROM community_demographics;
SELECT community_name, population_size FROM community_demographics WHERE population_size > 10000;
SELECT * FROM awareness_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, target_community FROM awareness_campaigns WHERE target_community = 3;
SELECT campaign_name, awareness_level, effectiveness_rating FROM campaign_results WHERE effectiveness_rating > 3 ORDER BY effectiveness_rating ASC;
SELECT * FROM community_demographics;
SELECT community_name, population_size FROM community_demographics ORDER BY population_size DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM awareness_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT community_id, awareness_level FROM campaign_results WHERE effectiveness_rating > 5 ORDER BY community_id;
SELECT c.community_name, cr.awareness_level FROM community_demographics c INNER JOIN campaign_results cr ON c.community_id = cr.community_id;
SELECT * FROM community_demographics;
SELECT community_name, population FROM community_demographics WHERE pollution_level > 0.5;
SELECT community_name, population FROM community_demographics ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT c.community_name, d.age_group, d.gender FROM community_demographics c JOIN demographic_details d ON c.community_id = d.community_id;

SELECT cr.campaign_name, cr.start_date, cr.end_date, cd.community_name FROM awareness_campaigns cr JOIN campaign_results cr ON cr.campaign_id = cr.campaign_id JOIN community_demographics cd ON cr.community_id = cd.community_id WHERE outreach_success = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM community_demographics INNER JOIN demographic_details ON community_demographics.community_id = demographic_details.community_id WHERE age_group = '18-30' ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT community_name, SUM(population) AS total_population FROM community_demographics GROUP BY community_name ORDER BY total_population DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM awareness_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT community_name, pollution_level FROM community_demographics WHERE pollution_level > 0.5 ORDER BY community_name;
SELECT campaign_name, outreach_success FROM awareness_campaigns INNER JOIN campaign_results ON awareness_campaigns.campaign_id = campaign_results.campaign_id WHERE outreach_success = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM communities_demographic_info;
SELECT community_name, population_size FROM communities_demographic_info ORDER BY population_size DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT community_name FROM communities_demographic_info;
SELECT community_name, average_age, pollution_level FROM communities_demographic_info WHERE population_size > 100000;
SELECT * FROM campaign_participants WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT community_name, population_size FROM communities_demographic_info WHERE population_size > 10000 ORDER BY community_name DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM awareness_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT participant_name, age, gender FROM campaign_participants WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT community_name, pollution_level FROM communities_demographic_info WHERE pollution_level = 'High' ORDER BY community_name ASC;
SELECT campaign_id, AVG(rating) FROM campaign_feedback GROUP BY campaign_id HAVING AVG(rating) > 4 ORDER BY campaign_id ASC;
